Voice AI Use Cases

Scheduled Callbacks

If someone says "Call me back at 5 PM tomorrow," the AI will call at the exact time requested.

Recall Campaigns

Calls patients due for their 6-month check-up or cleaning (if the data is stored in your CRM).

Inbound Call Handling

Answers calls when your staff is busy, after hours, or during lunch breaks.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything You Need to Know

Get answers to the most common questions about our Voice AI solution and how it can transform your practice.

Our Voice AI responds to leads within 10 seconds of opt-in from your Meta ads, Google ads, or website forms — 24/7. This rapid response increases conversion rates by 391% according to industry studies, ensuring you never miss a potential patient.

Yes, absolutely! Our Voice AI operates 24/7 with no breaks, no sick leave, and no "out of office" periods. It handles inbound calls from prospects and patients at any time, ensuring your practice never misses an opportunity.

Yes! Our Voice AI integrates with any Australian PMS that has an online appointment page or API, booking patients directly into your system. It also pulls customer form responses from your CRM and routes callers to the correct clinic and calendar.

The AI automatically follows up with people who didn't book during the first conversation over the next 4–7 days (fully customizable). It continues following up until the patient is booked, with smart lead filtering that removes uninterested leads from the sequence based on call transcript analysis.

Absolutely! If someone says "Call me back at 5 PM tomorrow," the AI will call at that exact time requested. It also makes appointment reminder calls one day before scheduled appointments to reduce no-shows.

Yes! The AI can call patients due for check-ups or cleanings if the data is stored in your CRM. This helps maintain patient relationships and ensures regular care continuity for your practice.

Yes! Our Voice AI uses a natural Australian accent with a female voice for a familiar and friendly caller experience. It also leaves professional voicemail messages when calls go unanswered and can send clinic locations via SMS or email.

Absolutely! All calls and transcripts are recorded and logged, with links automatically attached to your CRM. This ensures complete accountability and allows you to track every interaction for quality assurance and performance analysis.

Very cost-effective! It pays for itself with just one implant case per month. It's cheaper than hiring Australian VAs at any scale and more affordable than Filipino VAs once you're handling mid-to-high volume (5,000+ calls/month). Plus, there's no training or onboarding required.

Yes! The system is infinitely scalable and effortlessly supports anywhere from 1 to 100+ clinic locations. It runs fully autonomously with zero supervision required, making it perfect for growing practices.

Package Scope

This package includes the Voice AI and integration to your existing lead generation system. It does not cover lead generation from Meta. The most comprehensive option — which also includes lead generation — is outlined in Package 2.
